text: That is very different! Well I wasn't specifically looking to do animation at university, it was chance I ended up speaking to the course leader at a UCAS event. I guess i have found the course interesting in some places, and confusing in others

Ah fair enough! So you're more interested in VFX then. It's a wide industry - is there any role in particular that appeals to you? Or do you need to know more about the different fields within VFX. I found it quite impenetrable when I first found out it was a realistic job opportunity
I guess if you're also interested in concept art, you might also be interested in DMP (digital matte painting)
